name: Clearblue Digital Pregnancy Test With Weeks Indicator - 1 test
description:
Product details
Clearblue Digital Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator is the first and only test that is as accurate as an ultrasound scan at dating pregnancy (1). Its smart dual sensor not only tells you in words on the digital display if you're pregnant or not, it also tells you how far along you are – weeks since conception are shown as 1-2, 2-3 or 3+. (2) With this home pregnancy test kit, you can test 5 days before your missed period (which is 4 days before you expect your period). 65% of pregnant results can be detected 5 days before your missed period. If testing before you expect your period, you must use your first urine of the day for an accurate Weeks Indicator result.
For more information on this product or answers to your questions, our Careline advisors are available for you 07:00 – 15:00 hrs Mon-Fri, excluding Bank Holidays. You can also get more information about this pregnancy test at uk.clearblue.com.

(1) Weeks result 97% in agreement with later ultrasound dating scan. Based on studies of 187 women comparing result to ultrasound dating.

Tells you if you are pregnant and how many weeks since you conceived: 1-2, 2-3 or more than 3 weeks

As accurate as an ultrasound scan at dating pregnancy (1)

Test early: results 5 days before your missed period (4 days before you expect your period) (2)

No brand is more accurate: Clearblue is over 99% accurate at detecting pregnancy from the day you expect your periodUnmistakably clear results in words, in 3 minutesNo. 1 brand most recommended in a survey of doctors in the UK
How to use
For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Not for internal use. Do not reuse. Keep out of reach of children.Store between 2° – 30°C. Allow to reach room temperature for 30 minutes prior to testing if stored refrigerated. Do not use if the foil wrapper is damaged. Do not use after the ‘use by’ date. Contains small parts.Do not eat any component of this device. If accidentally swallowed, seek medical attention. Report any injury caused by the use of this product to Clearblue.This product contains batteries. Dispose of it in accordance with local regulations.Disposing of your testRemove the battery prior to test stick disposal. Battery disposal should be in accordance with the appropriate recycling scheme. To remove, insert a coin into the slot at the end and twist to break open the back of the test stick. If battery is not visible, slide the battery holder out in the direction of the arrow to assist removal.Caution: do not disassemble, recharge or dispose of batteries in fire. Dispose of the rest of the stick according to the appropriate recycling scheme for electrical equipment. Do not dispose of electrical equipment in fire.
Hazards and Cautions
Always read the manufacturers’ instructions for any medication you are taking before testing. Medications containing hCG, and certain rare medical conditions, can cause false positive results. Ectopic or recent pregnancy, even if not carried to full term, can cause misleading results. If you are in or approaching the menopause you may obtain a false pregnant result even though you are not pregnant. The test should NOT be affected by hormone therapies containing Clomiphene citrate, common painkillers, alcohol, antibiotics, or the contraceptive pill. If you get any unexpected results you should discuss them with your doctor. Multiple and ectopic pregnancies can give misleading Weeks Indicator results.This IVD digital device meets the missions and immunity requirements of EN 61326-2-6. The EMC countermeasures employed within the electronic instrument will provide reasonable protection against electromagnetic interference effects likely to be encountered in the home environment. The following preventive warnings apply to EN 61326-2-6 compliant equipment. a) Use of this instrument in a dry environment, especially if synthetic materials are present (synthetic clothing, carpets etc.) may cause damaging static discharges that may cause erroneous results. b) Do not use this instrument in close proximity to sources of strong electromagnetic radiation (e.g., mobile phones), as these may interfere with the proper operation.SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH, Route de St Georges 47, 1213 Petit-Lancy, Geneva, Switzerland. GB: 0800 917 2710; IE: 1800 812 607. www.clearblue.com. Name & Adress of Authorised Representative: MDSS GmbH, Schiffgraben 41 Hannover 30175, Germany: info@mdssar.com.
Important info
Country of Origin: United Kingdom

Address: UK: Customer Support, SPD Development Company Ltd, Clearblue Innovation Centre, Priory Business Park, Bedford, MK44 3UP

EU: SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH, Route de St Georges 47, 1213 Petit-Lancy, Geneva, Switzerland

name: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream Very Dry Skin 50ml
description:
Product details
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone.

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative.

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Night Cream for Very Dry Skin boosts the skin’s radiance thanks to the service tree bud extract. It is perfect for everyone whose skin needs extra nourishment.
Suitable for
Dry Skin
How to use
Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.

name: Cl-ear Olive Oil Ear Spray 20ml
description:
Product details
Easy to use spray, now in a bigger value pack. Gently softens & removes ear wax. Reduces the need for syringing. With medical grade olive oil. 
  Ear wax is a natural, oily substance produced to protect the eardrum. In some people this wax can build up which can lead to ear pain or partial hearing loss. Olive oil is a natural lubricant which gently softens and helps remove ear wax. Olive Oil can be used during pregnancy and whilst breastfeeding.
Suitable for
Suitable for children 12+, adults and the elderly. Children under the age of 12 should receive medical diagnosis before use. 
How to use
• Check that the nozzle and bottle are not damaged or broken before use.
• Before using a new bottle of olive oil, shake well, then press the actuator down 3 to 4 times until you get a spray. This will prime the system for first use.
• Tilt head to one side with the affected ear facing upwards.
• Holding the bottle in an upright position with the nozzle placed in the ear canal, depress the actuator fully 1 or 2 times.
• Gently massage around the outside of the ear.
• Plug the ear lightly with cotton wool if required to prevent leakage.
• To remove oil, tilt head so that ear is facing downwards and allow oil to drain. Gently wipe outside of ear to remove residue.
• Gently wipe nozzle with clean cotton wool after use.
• Use the spray twice a day for up to 5 days.
• Repeat with other ear if required.
• The doctor, nurse, or specialist may advise you with specific instructions for using the spay depending on the severity of the wax problem. You should follow the instructions to ensure removal of wax.
Hazards and Cautions
Children under the age of 12 years should receive medical diagnosis before using this spray to confirm earwax is present. Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you are using any other medication in your ears. Do not use if the ear is infected, inflamed or bleeding or if the eardrum is ruptured. There are no known side effects when using olive oil but if you experience any irritation or any other effects stop using them and tell your doctor or pharmacist. Avoid contact with the eyes, in case of accidental contact, rinse thoroughly with clean water and consult a doctor. If symptoms persist, consult your doctor. Keep out of the sight and reach of children. For external use only.
  Storage 
Store between 10˚C - 25˚C. Do not use after the expiry date printed on the carton and label. Use within 28 days of first opening otherwise discard the contents.
Ingredients
100% Olive Oil BP

description:

Dermatologist-developed formula. Exfoliating lotion for oily skin sweeps away excess oil that can lead to breakouts.

Concern
Dull skin, excess oil, clogged pores

Gently exfoliates oily skin

Results
Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Looking healthy.

With less-noticeable pores.


Details
Gentle exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Key Ingredients
BHA (salicylic acid)

Witch hazel

Helps refine skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas
Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.


*Specific ingredients vary by skin-typed formula.

name: Clinique Moisture Surge Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator 15ml
description:
Product details
Who It's For
Very Dry, Dry Combination
What It Is
The rich cream-gel you love delivers an instant moisture boost, and keeps skin continuously hydrated for 72 hours-even after washing your face. Skin’s moisture barrier is strengthened and skin feels soothed, with lipids and cica. Oil-free
What It Does
Our richest formula yet, with actived aloe water and caffeine, sets non-stop hydration into motion. Then, with a trio of lipids, helps lock in moisture in. Keeps skin hydrated for 72 hours, leaving it glowing, looking plump, and feeling velvety-smooth. Dry, dehydrated skin feels soothed with cica.
Key Ingredients/Technology
Hyaluronic acid: This moisture-binding ingredient has the unique ability to hold 1,000 times its weight in water, helping to create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration.
Activated aloe water: Water is infused with aloe leaf extract to help deliver intense hydration.
Cica: Also known as tiger grass, cica is a centuries-old ingredient used in ancient Chinese tradition. Helps soothe dry, delicate skin.
Auto-Replenishing Lipid-Filler Technology: Using activated aloe water and caffeine, this technology helps support skin’s natural hydration. Uses three types of lipids to help support skin’s moisture barrier locking in hydration.
Great To Know:
Our packaging: Now in more sustainable packaging. 30ml, 50ml, and 125ml are made from glass that’s recyclable. 15ml jar is made with minimum 44% post-consumer recycled material. Please remove cap to recycle.
What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.â
How to recycle: The glass jars are recyclable. Remove the cap, then rinse the jar and place in a recycling binâ.
Suitable for
All skin types
How to use
Apply AM and PM on clean skin. Use alone or under makeup, on dry spots, or as a 5-minute mask.

name: Clinique Clarifying Do-Over Peel 30ml
description:
Product details
With a special 32% Micro-Acid+ Complex, reveals fresher surface cells for skin that looks radiant and renewed.

Skin Types: Dry Combination to Oily Skin
Key Ingredients: 7-acid blend of AHAs/BHA/PHA, algae extract, yeast extract
Benefits: Smooths and renews the look of skin

What It Does:
· This at-home peel helps to reveal fresher surface cells with each use, and is gentle enough to leave on.
· With a special 32% Micro-Acid+ Complex, this potent formula works from multiple angles to help support skin’s turnover process through exfoliation, supporting skin’s natural renewal and helping to remove dead skin cells that build up on the surface.
· In addition to removing dead skin cells, it also removes dirt and oil-all of which can clog pores and lead to breakouts.
· Skin looks smoother and more radiant and feels softer.
· It’s the perfect complement to our twice-daily exfoliator, Clarifying Lotion. For powerful exfoliation, use Clarifying Do-Over Peel 2-3 nights a week and then on other nights and every morning, use Clarifying Lotion.

Key Ingredients:
An exclusive 32% Micro-Acid+ Complex features:
• 7-acid blend of AHAs/BHA/PHA: Helps to remove dead skin cells that build up on skin’s surface and make skin appear dull. The blend includes glycolic acid, lactic acid, citric acid, tartaric acid, pyruvic acid-all alpha hydroxy acids; salicylic acid, a beta hydroxy acid; and lactobionic acid, a poly hydroxy acid.
· Algae and yeast extracts: Help support skin’s natural renewal for fresh, smoother-looking skin.

Formula Facts:
· Fragrance free.
· Allergy tested.


Free Of:
Info pending regulatory/R&D review, as well as legal sustainability approval (route through the free-of process).
How to use
• 2-3 nights a week, saturate a cotton pad and sweep over clean skin. No need to rinse.
• Follow with serum and moisturizer. 
• If you use Clarifying Lotion, skip it the nights you use Clarifying Do-Over Peel.
• Use as directed. If irritation occurs, limit frequency of use and if it persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Avoid eye area. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after.

name: Clinique Blackhead Solutions Self-Heating Blackhead Extractor
description:
Product details
What It Does

Gentle-yet-effective treatment extracts blackheads without pain, squeezing or damage to skin.
When mixed with water, the unique formula develops a warming sensation that gently opens clogged pores for an easy removal of blackhead-causing dirt, oil and debris. Smooths the way for clearer, softer, shine-free skin. Helps keep future blackheads from developing.

Proven Results

• Starts clearing plugged pores from first use
• In 1 week, see a 69% reduction in blackheads
• In 6 weeks, see a 93% reduction in blackheads*

A potent blend of Salicylic Acid and Glucosamine clears away dead surface skin cells to prevent future blackheads, while Diatomaceous Earth, Bamboo Powder and Pumice exfoliate and resurface skin’s texture. Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate leaves skin feeling calm and comfortable.
How to use
Unscrew cap and remove seal.

Apply product on clean, dry skin.

Screw cap back on.

Wet skin to activate heat.

Massage with applicator, 15-30 seconds.

Then rinse.

name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2 Twice a Day Exfoliator - for Dry Combination Skin
description:
Product details
Dermatologist-developed formula. Exfoliating lotion for dry-combination skin sweeps away dulling flakes.

Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.

Concern
Dull skin, noticeable pores

Benefits
Gently exfoliates dry-combination skin

Key Ingredients
Witch hazel and acetyl glucosamine

Skin Types
Dry Combination

Results
Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Looking healthy.

With less-noticeable pores.


Details
Gentle exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Key Ingredients
Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas
Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.


*Specific ingredients vary by skin-typed formula.

Formula Facts
Dermatologist developed

Dermatologist tested

Allergy tested

Fragrance free


Free Of
Fragrance

Oil


Clinique 3-Step System
3 steps. 3 minutes.

Twice a day.

Clinique’s original dermatologist-developed routine is simple, effective, iconic. Created by our founding dermatologist, 3-Step Skincare is scientifically designed to create healthy-looking skin.

Just 3 steps, 3 minutes, twice a day. Each step is tailored to your Clinique Skin Type.

Step 1: Cleanse with Facial Soap

Step 2: Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion

Step 3: Moisturise with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.
How to use
Use twice a day, morning and night.

Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.

For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.

Follow with Step 3, moisturiser: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

name: Clearblue Digital Pregnancy Test Combo Pack 3 Tests
description:
Product details
3 pregnancy tests for extra reassurance! This pack gives you the opportunity to TRIPLE-check early, and date your pregnancy: it contains 1 Clearblue Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator and 2 Clearblue Ultra Early Pregnancy Tests. With the accuracy you expect from Clearblue, the 3 sticks of this home pregnancy test kit are over 99% accurate from the day you expect your period. Use Clearblue Ultra Early Pregnancy Test for results up to 6 days before your missed period (5 days before your expected period) (1). Clearblue Ultra Early is our most sensitive pregnancy test (10mIU/ml) - no test can tell you sooner. Clearblue Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator is the first and only test that is as accurate as an ultrasound scan at dating pregnancy (2). It also tells you how far along you are - weeks since conception are shown as 1-2, 2-3 or 3+. With this home pregnancy test, you can test 5 days before your missed period (4 days before your expected period) (1). If testing before you expect your period, you must use your first urine of the day for an accurate Weeks Indicator result. For more information on this product or answers to your questions, our Careline advisors are available for you 07:00 - 15:00hrs Mon-Fri, excluding Bank Holidays, at 0800 917 2710 (UK) / 1800 812 607 (IE). You can also get more information about this pregnancy test at uk.clearblue.com. Leave a review if you bought the product: your opinion counts! Ratings and reviews help others decide which product to buy. (1) Ultra Early: 79% of pregnant results can be detected 6 days before your missed period (5 days before your expected period). Weeks Indicator: 65% of pregnant results can be detected 5 days before your missed period (4 days before your expected period). (2) Weeks result 97% in agreement with later ultrasound dating scan. Based on studies of 187 women comparing weeks result to ultrasound dating.
How to use
Pregnancy Test Ultra Early:For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Not for internal use. Do not reuse. Keep out of reach of children. Store between 2° - 30°C. Allow to reach room temperature for 30 minutes prior to testing if stored refrigerated.Do not use if the foil wrapper is damaged. Do not use after the ‘use by' date.Once foil is opened, use immediately. Discard with normal household waste.Contains small parts. Do not eat any component of this device. If accidentally swallowed, seek medical attention. Report any injury caused by the use of this product to Clearblue and the Competent Authority of the member state.Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator:For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Not for internal use. Do not reuse. Keep out of reach of children.Store between 2° - 30°C. Allow to reach room temperature for 30 minutes prior to testing if stored refrigerated. Do not use if the foil wrapper is damaged. Do not use after the ‘use by' date. Contains small parts.Do not eat any component of this device. If accidentally swallowed, seek medical attention. Report any injury caused by the use of this product to Clearblue.This product contains batteries. Dispose of it in accordance with local regulations.Disposing of your testRemove the battery prior to test stick disposal. Battery disposal should be in accordance with the appropriate recycling scheme. To remove, insert a coin into the slot at the end and twist to break open the back of the test stick. If battery is not visible, slide the battery holder out in the direction of the arrow to assist removal.Caution: do not disassemble, recharge or dispose of batteries in fire. Dispose of the rest of the stick according to the appropriate recycling scheme for electrical equipment. Do not dispose of electrical equipment in fire.
Hazards and Cautions
Pregnancy Test Ultra Early:Always read the manufacturers' instructions for any medication you are taking before testing. Medications containing hCG, and certain rare medical conditions, can cause false positive results. Ectopic or recent pregnancy, even if not carried to full term, can cause misleading results. If you are in or approaching the menopause you may obtain a false pregnant result even though you are not pregnant. The test should NOT be affected by hormone therapies containing Clomiphene citrate, common painkillers, alcohol, antibiotics, or the contraceptive pill. If you get any unexpected results you should discuss them with your doctor.Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator:Always read the manufacturers' instructions for any medication you are taking before testing. Medications containing hCG, and certain rare medical conditions, can cause false positive results. Ectopic or recent pregnancy, even if not carried to full term, can cause misleading results. If you are in or approaching the menopause you may obtain a false pregnant result even though you are not pregnant. The test should NOT be affected by hormone therapies containing Clomiphene citrate, common painkillers, alcohol, antibiotics, or the contraceptive pill. If you get any unexpected results you should discuss them with your doctor. Multiple and ectopic pregnancies can give misleading Weeks Indicator results.This IVD digital device meets the missions and immunity requirements of EN 61326-2-6. The EMC countermeasures employed within the electronic instrument will provide reasonable protection against electromagnetic interference effects likely to be encountered in the home environment. The following preventive warnings apply to EN 61326-2-6 compliant equipment. a) Use of this instrument in a dry environment, especially if synthetic materials are present (synthetic clothing, carpets etc.) may cause damaging static discharges that may cause erroneous results. b) Do not use this instrument in close proximity to sources of strong electromagnetic radiation (e.g., mobile phones), as these may interfere with the proper operation.SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH, Route de St Georges 47, 1213 Petit-Lancy, Geneva, Switzerland. GB: 0800 917 2710; IE: 1800 812 607. www.clearblue.com. Name & Adress of Authorised Representative: MDSS GmbH, Schiffgraben 41 Hannover 30175, Germany: info@mdssar.com.

What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.

What does plant-derived plastic mean? It's made from an agricultural byproduct of processing sugarcane that would otherwise be discarded.

Details
Extra-gentle liquid exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Salicylic acid

Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.

Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Details
Clinique dark spot corrector features our proprietary brightening molecule and vitamin C for a more even-looking skin tone, including post blemish marks. Plus improves the look of existing dark spots.

Our formula with CL302 Brightening Complex™ delivers brighter looking skin. It’s gentle enough for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

Key Ingredients
CL302 Brightening Complex™ with vitamin C targets the appearance of dark spots on your face by helping to improve the look of them with the CL302 Complex.

CL302 Complex
Helps reduce the look of dark spots. It includes the following:
Vitamin C (ascorbyl glucoside): brightening ingredient helps to reduce the look of dark spots and improve the appearance of skin tone.

Salicylic acid: Gently sloughs off the uppermost layers of the skin to help reveal fresher, more even-looking skin.

Glucosamine: Helps encourage the exfoliation of surface discolouration for brighter, more even-looking skin.

Yeast extract: Clinique’s “cluster buster” helps exfoliate to reduce the look of large clusters of excess pigment (dark spots).


Interrupter Complex
With a cocktail of soothing ingredients helps minimise the look of irritation to interrupt the look of future discolouration. It includes the following:
Gyokuro (camellia sinensis leaf) extract: A green tea harvested with a special method in Japan that helps quell the look of irritation.

Rice bran extract: A potent ingredient, it helps to defend against the look of future dark spots.

name: Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test 1 Digital Test
description:
Product details
Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test, 1 Digital Test
Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test kit combines ultra-sensitive early detection of the pregnancy hormone with ultra clear digital results in words.
Our most sensitive digital pregnancy test can be used up to six days before your missed period. *75% of pregnant results can be detected 6 days before your missed period (which is 5 days before you expect your period). Test sensitivity is 10mIU/ml.
Testing is made easy by an extra wide tip and our unique stop light feature, which flashes to tell you when you have sampled enough urine. Plus our Floodguard Technology helps to dramatically reduce reported user error (data on file).
Once the test is running, the Smart Countdown will appear on screen to reassure you the test is progressing, counting down to your clear digital result in words, which will appear on screen within 1-5 minutes.
Like all Clearblue Pregnancy Tests, Digital Ultra Early is over 99% accurate at detecting pregnancy when used from the day you expect your period. 
For more information visit our website: www.clearblue.com
•No brand is more accurate: over 99% accurate from the day you expect your period
•Ultra sensitive detection of hCG (10mIU/ml)
•Ultra early results 6 days before your missed period*
•Ultra clear results in words for more trust in your early result - no faint lines
•No.1 brand most recommended in a survey of doctors in the UK (data on file)
•Ultra easy to use - with unique stop light, wide tip, FloodguardTM Technology, Smart Countdown to result
How to use
For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Not for internal use. Do not reuse. Keep out of reach of children. Store between 2° – 30°C. Allow to reach room temperature for 30 minutes prior to testing if stored refrigerated. Do not use if the foil wrapper is damaged. Once foil is opened, use immediately. Do not use after the ‘use by’ date. This product contains batteries. Dispose of in accordance with local regulations. Contains small parts. Do not eat any component of this device. If accidentally swallowed, seek medical attention. Report any injury caused by the use of this product to Clearblue and the Competent Authority of the member state.Disposing of your test Remove the batteries prior to test stick disposal. Battery disposal should be in accordance with the appropriate recycling scheme. To remove, insert the curved edge of the cap into the side of the test stick and twist to break open the stick. Caution: Do not disassemble, recharge or dispose of batteries in fire. Dispose of the rest of the stick according to the appropriate recycling scheme for electrical equipment. Do not dispose of electrical equipment in fire.
Hazards and Cautions
Please read the enclosed leaflet before use.
For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Do not reuse.
Keep out of reach of children.
Storage
Store between 2°- 30°C.
Important info

name: Clean  Clear Exfoliating Daily Wash 150ml
Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test Kit - 10 tests
description:
Product details
Trying for a baby? Track your cycles in our FREE app, designed for use with Clearblue Advanced Digital or Digital Ovulation Tests. Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test kit is proven to help you get pregnant (1), by accurately pinpointing your 2 best days to get pregnant each cycle.

The ovulation stick shows a clear smiley face on the digital display when your LH surge has been detected, so you know that today and tomorrow are your best 2 days when you're trying for a baby. When trying to get pregnant, taking folic acid or pre-pregnancy vitamins is all good advice, but it's really important to have sex at the right time during your cycle.

The days leading up to and including the day of ovulation are the only days each cycle when a woman can get pregnant. Unlike basal body temperature (BBT) charting, ovulation predictor kits detect the rise in luteinising hormone (LH test)—a key fertility hormone that rises prior to ovulation—to accurately detect the days BEFORE, and not AFTER ovulation. Whilst ovulation test strips are widely available, 7 in 10 [73%] women did not find strip tests easy to use (2). Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test is over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge and has been validated by ultrasound (3).

(1) Product data on file.
(2) In a study of 111 women in the UK using and reading different test types. Data on file.
(3) A study of 40 women found agreement with ovulation observed by ultrasound.

To find out if your phone is compatible and if the Clearblue Period & Cycle Tracker app is available in the country you live in, check out: clearblue.com/connectivity


Find your 2 peak days: at home urine test which pinpoints your 2 most fertile days, to maximise your chances of getting pregnant

Over 99% accurate at detecting the luteinising hormone (LH) surge. Hormones are a more accurate predictor of ovulation than basal body temperature (BBT), which only rises after ovulation

Easy to read: the only brand giving a unique digital ‘smiley face’ when it detects the LH surge in your urine, prior to ovulation

Once your LH surge is detected have sex at any time during the following 48 hours to maximise your chances of getting pregnant

No. 1 UK Doctor recommended brand in a survey of doctors in the UK (data on file). Providing pregnancy tests, ovulation kits and fertility tests for women for over 35 years

1 Digital Holder and 10 Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test Sticks included

Try our FREE Period & Cycle Tracker app: view where you are in your cycle and see how the probability of peak fertility varies for women with the same cycle length as you. Use Clearblue Ovulation Tests to identify your peak days

Personal Advisors: should you have any questions about this product, our team are available 07:00 – 15:00 hrs Mon-Fri, excluding Bank Holidays
How to use
For in vitro diagnostic use only. Not for internal use. Do not reuse test sticks. Keep out of reach of children. Store between 2° – 30°C. Allow to reach room temperature for 30 minutes prior to testing if stored refrigerated. Do not use if the foil wrapper is damaged. Do not use after the ‘use by’ date. Once test stick foil is opened, use immediately. This product contains batteries. Contains small parts. Do not eat any component of this device. If accidentally swallowed, seek medical attention. Report any injury caused by the use of this product to Clearblue and the competent authority of the member state. Only use test sticks for Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test with the holder. Not for contraceptive use. Results must be read on the display and not by any lines you might see on the test stick.Disposing of your holderWhen you have finished using the holder, separate the upper and lower halves starting at the end nearest the display. Remove the batteries from under the central metal cover and dispose of them according to the appropriate recycling scheme. Caution: Do not take apart, recharge, or dispose of the batteries in fire. Do not swallow. Keep away from children. Dispose of the rest of the holder according to the appropriate recycling scheme for electrical equipment. Do not dispose of electrical equipment in fire.
Hazards and Cautions
Clomiphene citrate does not affect the tests, but may affect the length of your cycle and, therefore, when you should be testing. You may need to continue testing with a new pack.You may get misleading results if you are pregnant, have recently been pregnant, have reached the menopause, have impaired liver or kidney function, have polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS).Always read the manufacturer’s instructions for any medication you are taking before testingYou may get misleading results if you are taking fertility drugs containing luteinising hormone (LH) or human Chorionic Gonadotrophin, or are taking antibiotics containing tetracyclines. Clomiphene citrate does not affect the tests.If you have recently stopped using hormonal contraception your cycles may be irregular so you may wish to wait until you have had 2 cycles before testing.As prenatal care is very important for a baby’s health, we recommend that you consult your doctor before you try to conceive. Check with your doctor if you are taking any medication or have any medical condition before planning a pregnancy. If you have a medically diagnosed fertility problem, ask your doctor if this test is suitable for you and if you do get unexpected results discuss them with your doctor.If you are under 35 years and haven’t become pregnant, we recommend you see your doctor after 12 months. If you’re over 35 years see your doctor if you haven’t become pregnant after 6 months, and straight away if you are over 40.This IVD digital device meets the emissions and immunity requirements of EN 61326-2-6. The EMC countermeasures employed within the electronic instrument will provide reasonable protection against electromagnetic interference effects likely to be encountered in the home environment. The following preventive warnings apply to EN 61326-2-6 compliant equipment. a) Use of this instrument in a dry environment, especially if synthetic materials are present (synthetic clothing, carpets etc.) may cause damaging static discharges that may cause erroneous results. b) Do not use this instrument in close proximity to sources of strong electromagnetic radiation (e.g., mobile phones), as these may interfere with the proper operation.SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH, Route de St Georges 47, 1213 Petit-Lancy, Geneva, Switzerland. GB: 0800 917 2710; IE: 1800 812 607. www.clearblue.com. Name & Adress of Authorised Representative: MDSS GmbH, Schiffgraben 41 Hannover 30175, Germany: info@mdssar.com.

Clinique’s Aromatics Elixir™ Eau de Parfum is a cult-classic luxury perfume. Perfumers call it a chypre, meaning its unique blend of notes creates a predominantly woodsy, mossy scent.

This long-lasting perfume combines more than 700 ingredients to create a confident, sensuous fragrance.

Rich vetiver, lush oakmoss, and luxurious patchouli are balanced with the soft florally of ylang ylang and rose—a bold blend that stirs the senses and spirit in subtle, pleasing ways.

A uniquely intense and non-conformist perfume that always makes a statement, Aromatics Elixir™ is designed for the true individual.

The Aromatics Elixir™ collection.
Clinique’s bold non-conformist fragrance was one of the first aromatherapy-inspired scents when it launched in 1971. This intriguing elixir always makes a statement.

The full body experience.
Layer on our Aromatics Elixir™ fragrance collection and enjoy its complex blend of luxury notes.

Start in the bath or shower with our Aromatics Elixir™ Body Wash, a scented cleansing gel.

Pamper skin after your shower with silky Aromatics Elixir™ Body Smoother.

The finishing touch: a luxe spritz of Aromatics Elixir™ Eau de Parfum.
How to use
Spray onto pulse points: wrists, neck, and chest.

Key points like the nape of your neck, the insides of your wrists, and behind your knees generate more body heat, which helps activate the scent.

To make the most of your scent, spritz it on after showering or moisturising

name: Clinique Moisture Surge Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator 30ml
description:
Product details
Clinique Moisture Surge™ Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator 30ml

Delivers an instant moisture boost,with activated aloe water and caffeine to keep skin continuously hydrated - even after washing your face. Skin’s moisture barrier is strengthened and skin feels soothed, with lipids and cica. Leaves skin glowing, looking plump, and feeling velvety-smooth. Oil-free.

Texture: Rich cream-gel
Great for: Very dry to dry combination skin.

Key Ingredients/Technology
Hyaluronic acid: Plumps and smooths. This moisture-binding ingredient has the unique ability to hold 1,000 times its weight in water, helping to create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration.

Activated aloe water: Helps deeply hydrate. Water is infused with aloe leaf extract to set hydration into motion.

Cica: Helps calm + soothe dry delicate skin. Also known as tiger grass, cica is a centuries-old ingredient used in ancient Chinese tradition.

Auto-Replenishing Lipid-Filler Technology: Using activated aloe water and caffeine, this technology helps support skin’s natural hydration. Uses three types of lipids to help support skin’s moisture barrier locking in hydration.


Real Results
We tested our new Moisture Surge Intense 72H on women in Siberia during winter, where they face extreme weather conditions (think: -13 0F) -and the results were glowing.*

Immediately:
98% said their skin felt hydrated.

97% said their skin felt soft.

94% said their skin felt protected in extreme cold.

98% said their tight, dry skin felt relieved.

*Consumer testing on 106 women after using the product for 4 weeks.

Dermatologist tested. 100% fragrance free.

Our packaging: Now in more sustainable packaging. 30ml, 50ml, and 75ml are made from glass. Please remove cap to recycle. 15ml jar is made with minimum 44% from post-consumer recycled material.

What else is this product free of?
Oil, sulfates, denatured alcohol, synthetic colors.
How to use
Apply AM and PM on clean skin after cleansing with Liquid Facial Soap.

Can be used alone or under makeup, on dry spots, on dry hands and as a cuticle treatment or as a 5-minute mask.
Hazards and Cautions
-

name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 1 for Very Dry Skin 200ml
description:
Product details
Dermatologist-developed formula. Mild exfoliating lotion for very dry skin sweeps away dulling flakes.

Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.

Concern
Dull skin, noticeable pores

Benefits
Gently exfoliates very dry skin

Key Ingredients
Salicylic acid, witch hazel and acetyl glucosamine

Skin Types
Very Dry to Dry

Results
Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Looking healthy.

With less-noticeable pores.


Details
Gentle exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Key Ingredients
Salicylic acid

Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas
Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.


*Specific ingredients vary by skin-typed formula.

Formula Facts
Dermatologist developed.

Dermatologist tested.

Allergy tested.

Fragrance free.


Free Of
Fragrance

Oil


Clinique 3-Step System
3 steps. 3 minutes.

Twice a day.

Clinique’s original dermatologist-developed routine is simple, effective, iconic.

Created by our founding dermatologist, 3-Step Skincare is scientifically designed to create healthy-looking skin.

Just 3 steps, 3 minutes, twice a day. Each step is tailored to your Clinique Skin Type.
Step 1: Cleanse with Facial Soap

Step 2: Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion

Step 3: Moisturise with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.
How to use
Use twice a day, morning and night.

Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.

For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.

Follow with Step 3, moisturiser: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream

name: Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream Very Dry Skin 50ml
description:
Product details
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone.

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative.

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Day Cream for Very Dry Skin protects the skin from pollutants due to its anti-pollution complex, protects the skin’s natural barrier with vegetal squalene and instantly smooths the skin thanks to line filing pearls. It is perfect for everyone whose skin needs extra nourishment.
Suitable for
Dry skin
How to use
Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.

Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Details
Extra-gentle liquid exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Salicylic acid

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

name: Clarins Total Eye Lift
description:
Product details
Calling all Super Restorative Total Eye Concentrate lovers - we have a new and improved formula, with the same texture, you're going to adore! Total Eye Lift is a lift-replenishing eye concentrate that acts on all eye concerns. The responsible plant powered formula is created with 94% of ingredients being from natural origin. This includes the Chrono Lift Duo made up of Cassie Wax, which is rich in fatty acids and Harungana, Clarins most effective anti-ageing ingredient, which together create a smoothing effect and long-term lift. This problem-solving product offers a solution to all women of all ages looking to de-puff the eye contour, reduce dark circles and lift and brighten the eye area. Total Eye Life is packaged in recyclable, airless glass.

Who it's for:
All women looking for an expert ‘lifting’ and anti-ageing eye care product that treats all signs of ageing from temple to temple: slackened eyelids, wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles.

Benefits :
Total Eye Lift offers 4 main benefits :
- Lift effect
- Smooths out fine lines, wrinkles and crow’s feet
- Restores density to the skin around the eyes
- Brightens the eyes and beautifies the lashes

Our key active ingredients:
Clarins uses over 250 natural plant extracts in its formulas. All those active ingredients are carefully selected for their effectiveness and are delivered in an optimal formula to reveal the beauty of every woman.
- Harungana : this organic extract helps to tighten skin
- Cassia : this wax is used for its toning properties

Firming eye cream
Rejuvenate and revive tired-looking eyes with an eye cream or an anti-fatigue eye gel from Clarins. Whether you want to stop the early signs of aging, or tackle existing puffiness, loss of density, and fine lines, we’ve got an eye firming cream to help.

Enhance the anti-aging effects of your eye cream by adding the matching day & night cream and a to take action against wrinkles and aging. You can also apply priming products like a hydrating serum to boost the effectiveness of your day moisturiser and enhance your routine.

About Clarins:
From the beginnings as a Parisian spa, Clarins has remained one of the biggest names in beauty for over 60 years. Thanks to our iconic product collection, brimming with pure plant extracts and essential oils, our products are both efficacious and luxurious.
How to use
Press gently with finger tips working outwards under the eye to temples and then gently press outwards over the eye lids to temples and then press between the brows.

Addtional secret beauty tip:
Store eye product in the fridge for that instant wake up feel in the morning.

Clarins Mixologie: The art of professional blending from our spas to you.
60" EYE LIFT: Everlasting Concealer + Total Eye Lift
Benefits: The eye contour area is smoothed and the eyes brightened
How to use it: Mix a small amount of Total Eye Lift with the Everlasting Concealer.

description:
Product details
Dermatologist-developed formula. Exfoliating lotion for dry-combination skin sweeps away dulling flakes.

Concern
Dull skin, noticeable pores

Benefits
Gently exfoliates dry-combination skin

Results
Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Looking healthy.

With less-noticeable pores.


Details
Gentle exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Key Ingredients
Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas
Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.


*Specific ingredients vary by skin-typed formula.

name: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream All Skin Types 50ml
description:
Product details
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone.

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative.

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Night Cream for All Skin Types boosts the skin’s radiance thanks to the service tree bud extract.
Suitable for
All skin types
How to use
Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.

name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion Twice a Day Exfoliator 3 for CombinationOily Skin 400ml
description:
Product details
Dermatologist-developed formula. Refreshing exfoliating lotion for combination-oily skin sweeps away dulling flakes and excess oil.

Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.

Concern
Dull, flaky skin

Benefits
Gently exfoliates combination-oily skin

Key Ingredients
Salicylic acid and witch hazel

Skin Types
Combination Oily

Results
Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Looking healthy.

With less-noticeable pores.


Details
Gentle exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Key Ingredients
Salicylic acid

Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas
Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.


*Specific ingredients vary by skin-typed formula.

Dermatologist developed

Dermatologist tested

Safe for sensitive skin

Allergy tested

Fragrance free


Free Of
Fragrance

Drying alcohol

Oil


Clinique 3-Step System
3 steps. 3 minutes.

Twice a day.

Clinique’s original dermatologist-developed routine is simple, effective, iconic. Created by our founding dermatologist, 3-Step Skincare is scientifically designed to create healthy-looking skin.

Just 3 steps, 3 minutes, twice a day. Each step is tailored to your Clinique Skin Type.

Step 1: Cleanse with Facial Soap

Step 2: Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion

Step 3: Moisturise with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.
How to use
Use twice a day, morning and night.

Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.

For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.

Clarityn Syrup provides up to 24 hours of relief from hayfever and other allergies.

Clarityn Syrup can relieve a variety of allergies like those caused by pets and dust, as well as hayfever and skin allergies like rashes, itching and hives.
Suitable for
Adults and children over 2 years.
  Age Restriction Purchasing this product online is only suitable for those aged 16 years and over. If you are under 16 years of age and wish to purchase this product, please speak with a pharmacist in store.
How to use
Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.

Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.

Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.

Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.

Directions for use:
Giving this medicine to children:
It is important to know how much your child weighs to make sure that you give the correct amount of medicine. For example, a 9 year old child weighs about 30kg (4st 7lb).
If in doubt weigh your child and then follow the instructions in the table.
Do not give to children under 2 years.

For Oral Use.
Dosage:
Age How much to take How often to take
Children of 2 to 12
years who weigh
30kg (4st 7lb) or less
5ml Once daily
Children of 2 to 12
years who weigh more
than 30kg (4st 7lb)
10ml Once daily
Adults and children
over 12 years
10ml Once daily
If you have severe liver problems your doctor or pharmacist may advise you to take the recommended amount every other day. If this applies to you follow their instructions.
Hazards and Cautions
Warning. Do not exceed the stated dose.

Do not use during pregnancy or if you are breast-feeding. If symptoms persist consult your doctor.

Keep out of the sight and reach of children.

Storage

Do not freeze.
Store in the original container.
Use within 1 month of opening.

Precautions

This is a medicine;
- Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or complementary therapy, or if symptoms persist
- Seek advice before using if you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, breastfeeding or if you suffer from allergies.
Active ingredients
Loratadine
Ingredients
Active Ingredients: Each 5ml contains 5mg loratadine.
Also Contains: disodium edetate (E386), sodium dihydrogen phosphate dihydrate (E339), maltitol liquid (E965), propylene glycol (E1520), glycerol (E422), phosphoric acid (E338), sodium benzoate (E211), sorbitol liquid (E420), sucralose (E955), artificial mixed berries flavour and purified water.

description:
Product details
Dermatologist-developed formula. Refreshing exfoliating lotion for combination-oily skin sweeps away dulling flakes and excess oil.

Results
Our Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator leaves skin:

Looking more radiant.

Looking smoother.

Looking healthy.

With less-noticeable pores.


Details
Gentle exfoliator can help create healthy-looking skin.

Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer looking skin.

Preps skin for moisturiser, exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.

For drier skins, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturiser.

For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise the look of excess oil and keep pores clear.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

Key Ingredients
Salicylic acid

Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas
Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Our formulas are powered by ingredients* like BHA (salicylic acid), witch hazel, acetyl glucosamine for just-right, twice-daily exfoliation. Which formula is just right for your skin?

Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.


*Specific ingredients vary by skin-typed formula.

Just 3 steps, 3 minutes, twice a day. Each step is tailored to your Clinique Skin Type.

name: Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test Kit - 10 tests
description:
Product details
Trying for a baby? Double your chances of getting pregnant (1) with Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation kit. You can also track your cycles in our FREE app, designed for use with Clearblue Advanced Digital or Digital Ovulation Tests. Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation kit typically identifies 4 or more fertile days (2) when you have the best chances to get pregnant each cycle.

By accurately tracking 2 key fertility hormones, estrogen and luteinising hormone, this ovulation test not only identifies 2 peak fertility days, but also additional high fertility days before that. This means you have more opportunities to get pregnant - at least twice as many as with any other ovulation test (2)

Unlike basal body temperature (BBT) charting, ovulation predictor kits detect the rise in luteinising hormone (LH) that rises prior to ovulation to accurately detect the day BEFORE, and day of ovulation. Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test detects estrogen which rises prior to the LH surge to detect more fertile days. As sperm can survive in your body for up to 5 days, you can become pregnant by having sex during the days leading up to ovulation (on high and peak fertility days) to maximise your chances of getting pregnant.

The clear digital display shows a Clearblue smiley face to identify your best days to get pregnant. Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test is over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge.

(1) In first cycle of use, vs not using ovulation tests.
(2) In a study of 87 women, 4 or more fertile days were identified in 80% of cycles using actual cycle length (2012). To find out if your phone is compatible and if the Clearblue Period & Cycle Tracker app is available in the country you live in, check out: clearblue.com/connectivity.


Double your chances of getting pregnant in the first cycle of use, vs not using ovulation tests

Clear results, unique Clearblue ‘smiley face’ appears on your fertile days: Have sex on High and Peak Fertility days to maximise your chances of getting pregnant

Typically identifies 4 or more fertile days (1) each cycle. It tracks 2 key fertility hormones to identify your High AND Peak fertility days, so you can plan ahead and have more opportunities to get pregnant

No. 1 UK Doctor recommended brand in a survey of doctors in the UK (data on file). Providing pregnancy tests, ovulation kits and fertility tests for women for over 30 years

Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Tests adapts to your unique hormone profile for cycle understanding

Over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge

Easy to use vs ovulation test strips - 7 in 10 [73%] women did not find strip tests easy to use. (2) In a study of 111 women in the UK using and reading different test types. Data on file

Try FREE Period & Cycle Tracker app: view where you are in your cycle and see how the probability of peak fertility varies for women with the same cycle length as you. Use Clearblue Ovulation Tests to identify your peak days
How to use
For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Not for internal use. Do not reuse test sticks. Keep out of reach of children. Store between 2° –30°C. Allow to reach room temperature for 30 minutes prior to testing if stored refrigerated. Do not use if the foil wrapper is damaged. Once foil is opened, use immediately. Do not use after the ‘use by’ date. This product contains batteries. Contains small parts. Do not eat any component of this device. If accidentally swallowed, seek medical attention. Report any injury caused by the use of this product to Clearblue and the competent authority for the Member State. Only use test sticks for Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test with the holder. Not for contraceptive use. Results must be read on the display and not by any lines you might see on the test stick.Disposing of your holderWhen you have finished using the holder, separate the upper and lower halves starting at the end nearest the display. Remove the batteries from under the central metal cover and dispose of them according to the appropriate recycling scheme. Caution: Do not take apart, recharge, or dispose of the batteries in fire. Do not swallow. Keep away from children. Dispose of the rest of the holder according to the appropriate recycling scheme for electrical equipment. Do not dispose of electrical equipment in fire.
Hazards and Cautions
Always read the manufacturer’s instructions for any medication you are taking before testing.You may get misleading results if you are taking fertility drugs containing luteinising hormone (LH) or human Chorionic Gonadotrophin, or are taking antibiotic containing tetracyclines. Some fertility treatments such as clomiphene citrate may give misleading High Fertility results but Peak Fertility results should not be affected.If you have recently stopped using hormonal contraception your cycles may be irregular so you may wish to wait until you have had 2 cycles before testing.As prenatal care is very important for a baby’s health, we recommend that you consult your doctor before you try to conceive. Check with your doctor if you are taking any medication or have any medical condition before planning a pregnancy. If you have a medically diagnosed fertility problem, ask your doctor if this test is suitable for you and if you do get unexpected results discuss them with your doctor.If you are under 35 years and haven’t become pregnant, we recommend you see your doctor after 12 months. If you’re over 35 years see your doctor if you haven’t become pregnant after 6 months, and straight away if you are over 40.This IVD digital device meets the missions and immunity requirements of EN 61326-2-6. The EMC countermeasures employed within the electronic instrument will provide reasonable protection against electromagnetic interference effects likely to be encountered in the home environment. The following preventive warnings apply to EN 61326-2-6 compliant equipment. a) Use of this instrument in a dry environment, especially if synthetic materials are present (synthetic clothing, carpets etc.) may cause damaging static discharges that may cause erroneous results. b) Do not use this instrument in close proximity to sources of strong electromagnetic radiation (e.g., mobile phones), as these may interfere with the proper operation.SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH, Route de St Georges 47, 1213 Petit-Lancy, Geneva, Switzerland. GB: 0800 917 2710; IE: 1800 812 607. www.clearblue.com. Name & Adress of Authorised Representative: MDSS GmbH, Schiffgraben 41 Hannover 30175, Germany: info@mdssar.com.

name: Clinique All About Clean 2-in-1 Charcoal Mask  Scrub 100ml
description:
Product details
Five-minute detoxifying face mask + face scrub formulated with bamboo charcoal powder and kaolin clay. Helps remove pollution and excess oil, plus refines skin’s texture.

Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.

Concern
Clogged pores, excess oil

Benefits
Dual-action face mask + scrub detoxifies skin

Key Ingredients
Formulated with bamboo charcoal powder and kaolin clay

Skin Types
All skin types

Details
Clinique’s All About Clean™ 2-in-1 Charcoal Mask + Scrub is a 5-minute dual-action, detoxifying face mask and exfoliating face scrub that helps remove pollution, impurities, and excess oil, plus refines skin’s texture.

Two-in-one formula with bamboo charcoal powder and kaolin clay delivers a powerful, detoxifying clean for polished skin.

Leaves skin clear, bright, and feeling smooth.

Clinique’s guiding dermatologists recommend gentle exfoliation for all skin types. Sweeping away dulling surface flakes and excess oil helps boost your skin’s natural turnover process so your newest, freshest skin can shine through.

Formula Facts
Allergy tested

Fragrance free


Free Of
Fragrance
How to use
On clean skin, use fingertips to apply a generous layer onto the face. Avoid eye area.

Leave on face for 5 minutes or until the mask turns pale grey.

For removal, use warm water, massage mask in circular motions to re-energize, exfoliate, and detoxify skin.

Rinse thoroughly and towel dry. Follow with a moisturiser.

For optimal results, use 1–2 times per week.

Avoid using scrub on active breakouts.
Hazards and Cautions
Avoid eye area. Please be aware that safety information may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the safety information on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date information.
